jobs.name: heartbeat
jobs.prompt: Quick check: anything need attention? Check system health, recent notifications. If nothing, just say HEARTBEAT_OK.

jobs.name: morning-briefing
jobs.prompt: Good morning. Give me my daily briefing: weather, calendar, important emails, top priorities for today.

jobs.name: evening-summary
jobs.prompt: End of day summary: what did we accomplish today? What's pending? Anything I should prep for tomorrow?

jobs.name: overnight-worker
jobs.prompt: Read the task list at ~/tasks/TODO.md. Pick the highest priority task marked 'ready'. Work on it. Write results to ~/tasks/completed/. Update TODO.md when done.

jobs.name: research
jobs.prompt: Research the latest trends in AI agents this week. Write a summary to ~/research/weekly-ai-trends.md
